name: seller_delivery_of_documents_days
title: Within how many days of Acceptance must the seller deliver Seller Documents (reports, disclosures, etc.)?
label: Seller Docs Days
description: Make sure you have enough time to review these documents.
tips: It is likely the seller already has these documents and they should be readily available. The default number of days should be enough time for review unless you know that you will need more time.
small_print: All seller documents must be carefully reviewed within the specified timeframe.

internal.notes: Days for seller to deliver required documents

seller_delivery_of_documents_days.name: seller_delivery_of_documents_days

suggested.hint: You'll need to give the seller at least 5 days but no more than 10 days to deliver the documents.

seller_delivery_of_documents_days.tooltip: Enter the number of days for document delivery
